title: A brief overview of my research
description: Introducing my research program and priorities.
contents:
I was asked to give a brief summary of my research program to the Department of Biostatistics, Epidemiology, and Informatics at Penn:



fitvids('.shareagain', {players: 'iframe'});

title: COVID-19 in Kids and Adults
description: A population science journal club discussion.
contents:
Today I had the opportunity to discuss SARS-CoV-2 transmission among kids and adults, drawing on a recent seroprevalence study. It was a pleasure to join the Penn DBEIâ€™s Population Science journal club. My slides are attached here.



fitvids('.shareagain', {players: 'iframe'});

title: FMT Update for Transplant Oncology
description: Applications of fecal microbiota transplantation (FMT) to the oncology population.
contents:
Today I gave a short talk on the development of fecal microbiota transplantation (FMT) methods and how FMT can be applied to oncology patients at risk for chemotherapy/antibiotic-related intestinal microbiota disruption and graft-versus-host-disease (GVHD).



fitvids('.shareagain', {players: 'iframe'});

title: Update on Fecal Microbiota Transplantation
contents:

title: Welcome!
